full_sentence: when it came to thinking about LTRing her, all i could do is think about how awful it would be to know that some other guy had hurt her. I want her to become the mother of my children so it breaks my heart to know that their mother is a woman who was used abused and dumped by some jackass chad. it made me sick. i will never understand why some men become literal cucks.

full_sentence: This very post actually brought together the views of myself and this faggot philosophy student causing trouble here in Australia. Amazing stuff, this kind of shit will unite reasonable folks eventually.
